programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The ladies grow tired of Christmas shopping during a heat wave; they volunteer to serve Christmas dinner at a soup kitchen.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche turns the tables and proposes to her brother-in-law.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy sends her unemployed son to live with his equally irresponsible father.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche renews hostilities with her sister when she travels home to attend her father's funeral.

programme.desc: The ladies grow tired of Christmas shopping during a heat wave; they volunteer to serve Christmas dinner at a soup kitchen.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier counsels the station manager on his divorce; Niles and Daphne study with a yogi (Alan Cumming).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier and Niles' search for quality caviar at an affordable price leads them to a questionable Russian supplier in a back alley.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier helps Habitat for Humanity build a house and gives unwanted decorating tips to the new homeowners.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: When a pathetic street singer (Elvis Costello) invades the Cafe Nervosa, Frasier and Niles are forced to find another coffeehouse.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Diane has second thoughts about having refused Sam's marriage proposal.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliff tries to persuade a wealthy man into marrying his mother.

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: When a body is found after 20 years, Shawn, Gus and Henry re-open the case.

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Henry fights for his life after being shot; Shawn seeks revenge on everyone involved in the scandal.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: While visiting his old friend Dr. Phil McGraw, Frasier encounters the agent (Harriet Sansom Harris) he fired and has second thoughts.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin questions his link with his sons when an out-of-town guest (David Ogden Stiers) arrives; Daphne and Niles plan for the future.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Julia (Felicity Huffman) and Frasier hide in a closet during an unlawful escapade; Niles and Martin go to the gun range; Roz interviews for a job at another station.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Roz reconsiders her plans to leave KACL for a new job due to growing concern over Frasier's budding relationship with Julia (Felicity Huffman); Daphne and Niles decide to start a family once they send her mother (Millicent Martin) packing.

programme.title: Snowcoming
programme.desc: A famous NFL quarterback returns to his hometown to celebrate his high school football coach's retirement. While in town, he rekindles a romance with his former sweetheart.

programme.title: Always Amore
programme.desc: Struggling to keep her late husband's Italian restaurant afloat, a woman agrees to work with a professional consultant to see if they can turn things around. At first she's resistant, but as they get closer, she realizes not all change is bad.

programme.title: A Country Wedding
programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).

programme.title: Roadhouse Romance
programme.desc: Lt. Callie Jackson returns home after a military tour to find her late grandfather's barbecue joint is struggling, but she has a run-in with a TV director who teaches her that sometimes it's best to look forward instead of looking back.

programme.title: Blind Date Book Club
programme.desc: A bookstore owner finds love and direction in her life when she agrees to review a famous author's new novel.

programme.title: The Wedding Cottage
programme.desc: A woman must convince an uninspired artist to renovate a rundown cottage for a couple's dream wedding.

programme.title: Royal-ish
programme.desc: Lacey is an amusement park princess who befriends eight-year-old Rose, a real-life princess and is recruited by her handsome father to travel to their kingdom and be the new governess.

programme.title: The Royal We
programme.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea, who has lived her life away from her royal duties, must step in and honor the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The girls help a pregnant teen and play host to Blanche's visiting pen pal.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche cannot bring herself to enter the hospital following her boyfriend's heart attack.

programme.desc: Rose prepares herself for a visit from her boyfriend's daughter; Blanche schemes to meet wealthy men.

programme.desc: Sophia visits Brooklyn, N.Y., for her anniversary, hoping to confront the ghost of her dead husband.

programme.desc: Blanche must have a pacemaker implanted and worries that it will affect her sex life.

programme.desc: Daphne and Niles plan a dinner party to make an important announcement, but Julia upstages them.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Embarrassed Brock believes the only way he can pay off his back taxes is to sell his house and move to Las Vegas.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Morgan returns to Houston with the intention of resuming his romance with Reba, despite the fact that he is still married.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba advises Van to treat Cheyenne as an equal in the family budget, which prompts him to give her an allowance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: In an effort to save Brock and Barbra Jean from losing their home, Reba and Van buy their house and rent it out to them.

programme.title: When Calls the Heart
programme.desc: The land dispute around McGinty's Meadow intensifies; Hickam and Mei throw a harvest festival for the town; Elizabeth helps Emily find her purpose.

programme.title: Love on the Menu
programme.desc: A popular chef rejects the idea of creating a gourmet frozen food line when the idea is presented by a food executive. But when the restaurant he runs with his wife faces financial problems, he reluctantly makes a deal.

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: When a former ski champion re-enters the competitive world after a 16-year-old downhill racer asks for help, she finds a new love and reawakens an old passion.

programme.title: Polar Opposites
programme.desc: Emma needs to get to Antarctica to reach her father and travels to South America but can't get on a boat for the last leg. She sneaks onto a cruise ship and meets engineer Andy.

programme.title: Snowkissed
programme.desc: A travel-averse journalist chases her dream assignment, and she unwillingly finds herself mentoring a handsome B&B owner who wants to be a tour guide.

programme.title: A Taste of Love
programme.desc: Taylor is determined to make a name for herself as a respected culinary chef. While reconnecting with her childhood sweetheart in her hometown, she receives an offer she can't refuse.
